room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by North Texas Escape Rooms in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Did Amnesia and loved it. Challenging but not too bad. Lots of puzzles, some easy and some hard. Good hints though. I will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by North Texas Escape Rooms in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I had such an awesome time playing Amnesia with my co-workers! I have played a number of escape rooms and this was definitely one of the top games in Dallas - challenging and immersive - highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by North Texas Escape Rooms in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I've done several escape rooms around the country and "Amnesia" has been the best so far. So many different elements to solve! Very creative. We had a team of seven and everyone was able to contribute.

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by North Texas Escape Rooms in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This was our first time. We did the room with the plane crash. It was very challenging but super fun. We did it as a family which was a great way for everyone to work together. The staff was amazing. I would highly recommend the McKinney location.

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by North Texas Escape Rooms in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This was my first time at an escape room. We unsuccessfully attempted to escape Amnesia. The puzzles and clues were very well thought out and really made me think. I enjoyed being able to put everything together to progress through the room. Even though we didn't escape, I would definitely do it again.
